function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in labor-intensive construction industry.","Impact":"Suspension of projects, workforce shortage, time overrun, and cost overrun.","Mitigation":"Establishing a COVID-19 prevention task force, educating workers on the virus, coordinating with hospitals, identifying potential risks, and controlling health and safety on construction sites.","Technologies":"Health and safety protocols, surveillance technology for monitoring virus spread.","People":"Workers in the construction industry, contractors, employers.","Owner":"Contractors, employers."}]}
